
Testing Suite
*************

Use these to test if "opacplot2" is running correctly.


Running Tests
=============

opacplot2.tests.run_cli(coverage=False)

   Use this function to run "opacplot2"'s test suite on the command
   line from the Python interpreter.

   Parameters:
      **coverage** (*bool*) -- Print a coverage report along with the
      test output.
